description:
Natsume has always been an outcast because he inherited his grandmother's ability to see yokai. After moving to his grandmother's hometown and accidentally releasing a yokai imprisoned in a Lucky Cat statue, he learns about his grandmother's "Book of Friends," which contains the names of the yokai she defeated, and allows its wielder to command the yokai named within. Since then, yokai now visit him on a daily basis, seeking to either get their names back or take possession of the Book of Friends.

(Source: NIS America)
synonyms: นัตสึเมะกับบันทึกพิศวง
O Livro de Amigos de Natsume

tags.name: Youkai
tags.description: Prominently features supernatural creatures from Japanese folklore.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Adoption
tags.description: Features a character who has been adopted by someone who is neither of their biological parents.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Estranged Family
tags.description: At least one family member of the MC intentionally distances themselves or a family distances themselves from a person related to the MC.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Outdoor Activities
tags.description: Centers around hiking, camping or other outdoor activities.

tags.name: Exorcism
tags.description: Involving religious methods of vanquishing youkai, demons, or other supernatural entities.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

node.description:
[Website](http://kitashuhei.com/) | [Twitter](http://twitter.com/KITAPONG)

He won Anison Grand Prix and went to sing opening themes for Persona -trinity soul- and Natsume Yuujinchou.
His first single 'Breakin' through' debuted at #26 on the Oricon ranking chart for CD singles in March.
He also performs Persona 3 Portable opening theme, Soul Phase, and Love Lebo Portable theme song, Secret Garden.
Hometown: Amami-Ōshima, Kagoshima, Japan   Performs in the 'shima-uta' folk style particular to Amami-Ōshima region.

He is an animator and character designer. Motohashi started working at Studio Z. Later, after leaving Studio Z, he started together with Hirayama Satoshi and Kamegaki Hajime Studio Z5. Today he is affiliated with Xebec and is the representative director of its subsidiary Xebec M2.
